clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in myocardium with SUVmax 7.0.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
recommendations: Consider lab tests to assess metabolic activity if indicated.
